title: Trend Micro Apex One Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Trend Micro Apex One. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the ApexOne Security Agent. The issue results from allowing authentication to be bypassed via a modified client that omits the authentication check. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000271974
timeline:
2020-04-14 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-09-25 - Coordinated public release of advisory
